name: Bubble Shmubble
description:
Setting out to learn Unity I stumbled upon a tutorial by brackeys. There he created a Bubble Trouble Clone. I followed his tutorial and moved on from there. Granted not a single line of tutorial code is left in my final product, I am still very thankful for brackeys's great introduction to this engine. 

Bubble Shmubble consists of two repeating levels - a normal bubble trouble one and a boss fight. Play until you die. And have fun.
